Or something as simple as reaching for my foot or calf and stretching out, I have to use a strap, so I'm having to get that all set up, stretch for maybe a few seconds and we're already moving on already. Again, this is my body and such and I know it's my issue. But I just wanted to make sure I provided some feedback!!
